title: Andrew Johnson National Historic Site: Current Conditions
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Current Conditions             Alerts & Conditions         Alerts    Caution        Extreme Heat  Alert 1 , Severity ,caution ,, Extreme Heat  During the forecast of extreme summer temperatures, guided tours of the presidential Homestead may be suspended to ensure the safety of our park visitors and staff. Call the Visitor Center (423-638-3551) to check the status of the tours.
